data.message: Hi there, someone is calling me telling me that they are from the advertisement team.  18007417060.  Is this a scam?

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Emily. You can confirm that you’ve been contacted by a Facebook representative by asking them to send you an email. Facebook representatives will have an @sales.fb.com, @support.facebook.com or @fb.com email address. All 3 email addresses are valid and only originate from authorized representatives of Facebook. Let us know if there’s anything else we can help you with. Thanks! -Rey

Facebook, this is usually a trojan who is posting on your behalf. Changing password won't do any good as long as the virus hasn't been deleted. The trojan will be able to post again as soon as you log back in.
